title: Remedial reading: a family affair
creator_credit: Bill Cole, New Zealand Council for Educational Research and University of Auckland
brief_description: Deals with a research project in the Mangere district of South Auckland which sets out to clarify whether parents wished to help their children with reading difficulties, how they could be helped and whether this assistance was of lasting benefit. Presenter Cheryl Sotheran.
